pullrequest.title: set solver tolerance to 0.1 for all worlds

content.raw: It could be coincidence, but I was trying this branch (patching it in overtop of r717), and I got 2 bad results.  Each time I asked the sim to beam to T3CP4.  First time the gazebo client froze on me; black screen.  Second time, val simply did not go anywhere, and things seemed oddly frozen.
content.html: It could be coincidence, but I was trying this branch (patching it in overtop of r717), and I got 2 bad results. Each time I asked the sim to beam to T3CP4. First time the gazebo client froze on me; black screen. Second time, val simply did not go anywhere, and things seemed oddly frozen.
